name: sbceq1dd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1), wsbc(s0, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c1, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c1, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c1, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c0))

comment: Equality theorem for class substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.) (Revised by NM, 30-Jun-2018.)
